item.title: CVE-2023-49342|2023-12-14T21:29:39.869Z -- ubuntu%20budgie -- budgie%20extras
item.description: Temporary data passed between application components by Budgie Extras Clockworks applet could potentially be viewed or manipulated. The data is stored in a location that is accessible to any user who has local access to the system. Attackers may pre-create and control this file to present false information to users or deny access to the application and panel.
